vote.title: Authorize the second step of acquisition for condemnation by eminent domain to acquire a tract of land containing approximately 7,799 square feet from Mesquite Landfill TX LP, located near the intersection of Kleberg Road and C.F. Hawn Freeway for the Southwest 120/96-inch Water Transmission Pipeline Project - Not to exceed $21,562.00 ($19,498.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $2,064.00) - Financing: Water Capital Improvement D Fund
